hadiths.text: It was narrated from As-Sab bin Jaththamah that:he gave the Messenger of Allah an onager when he was in Al-Abwa or in Waddan, but the Messenger of Allah gave it back to him. "And when the Messenger of Allah saw the expression on my face he said: "We only gave it back to you because we are in Ihram

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لاَ يَجُوزُ لِلْمُحْرِمِ أَكْلُهُ مِنَ الصَّيْدِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Game The Muhrim Is Not Permitted To Eat
